page.title: 18PARISH COUNCIL
page.content: Witheridge Parish Council has ten membersand have been very active for many years. They have taken a keen interest in the village and village activities and have started many new ventures. A few years ago they held a village appraisal and all the residents were asked for their views about different aspects of village life. As a result of this there were a number of developments. A newindoor bowling club was started, transport facilities were improved, a village magazine was started and there were various other activities started. The Council meet every month and meetings are also attended by members of the public.
